document_data.name: Ichthyglug
document_data.mainbody: '''Ichthyglug the Voluminous''' was a [[marid]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Ichthyglug was summoned into a pool in the [[Caverns of Ooze]] inside Undermountain and he couldn't go back to the [[Elemental Plane of Water]] until he obtained the [[phylactery]] of the [[lich]] [[Ezzat]]. However, he was confined to the pool. Afterward, the marid tried to convince all travelers to accept the quest of recovering the item for him, in exchange for a great treasure. If someone gave the phylactery to Ichthyglug, he immediately returned to the Elemental Plane of Water with all the pool but left the promised reward. If someone gave the item to [[Jaruk]] the [[dao]] instead, the marid learned of this and tried to kill the person.
document_data.Activities: While waiting to go back home, Ichthyglug used his time to swim around the pool with the [[quipper]]s and sing. If killed, Ichthyglug re-formed in 24 hours.
